tagline: The Waffle goes to the desert. Utah red rock gravel at its finest.

course.terrain_type: Red rock desert gravel with sustained mountain climbing
course.terrain_surface: Variable—smooth hardpack to chunky volcanic gravel
course.signature_challenge: Brian Head summit—climbing to 10,000+ feet on gravel tests both fitness and altitude tolerance.
course.character: Epic Utah scenery with serious climbing. Red rock meets alpine in one spectacular package.

suffering_zones.label: Canyon Entry
suffering_zones.desc: The climbing begins in earnest. Utah terrain reveals itself.

suffering_zones.label: Final Push
suffering_zones.desc: Descending on tired legs. Focus matters.

course.climate_description: Late May brings warm days, cool mornings, and Utah's intense high-altitude sun

biased_opinion.summary: BWR Cedar City takes the Waffle formula—long, hard, beautiful—and applies it to Utah's stunning terrain. The red rock landscape combined with alpine climbing creates a unique experience that justifies the travel.

logistics.parking: Downtown start area. Arrive early for good spots.
